Posts.Content: Nov 28, 2014 06:51PM C8inVA wrote: I'm in day 10 of 18 treatments for the left breast and I'm reading all of this with interest. I started to develop shooting pains in my left breast a few days ago. I'm wondering if massaging my breast with aquafor can prevent any future problems with necrosis or other problems?
Posts.Title: A rad onc weighs in on radiation "burns" Spinnerpom 53nancy
